title: At the Black Gate
author: VD
content_html: I’m pleased to inform you that I will henceforth be blogging once a week for Black Gate magazine. I’ve been a subscriber since not long after it launched, so I’m delighted to have the opportunity to contribute to a longtime favorite. Feel free to check out my initial post there if you like, but please leave any arguments, controversial assertions, and public demonstrations of psychiatric issues here. If you’re a Black Gate reader or fantasy literature enthusiast, I’d also be interested in knowing what sort of subjects you’d like to see me address there.
